entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.6°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 66 %

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
